English: You are under attack! Please wait, your village will load automatically.
中文: 你受到攻击！请稍候，您的城镇会自动载入。

English: Invalid location! Tap on an empty area
中文: 无效的位置！塔上的空白区域

English: Complete the previous building and free up a builder?
中文: 完成前面的建设和释放的建设工人？

English: You need to upgrade your Town Hall to level <number>!
中文: 您需要升级您的城镇大厅等级<数字>！

English: Do you really want to sell <item> for <number> <resource>?
中文: 难道你真的想，出售的<item> <编号> <资源>？

English: Build more or upgrade existing Gold Storages!
Build more or upgrade existing Elixir Storages!
Unable to find Facebook friends who play Clash of Clans
中文: 无法找到新浪上的朋友在玩强拆骑士团

English: Unable to find villages to attack!
中文: 我们无法找到可攻击的城镇！

English: Can't attack! Village is already under attack.
中文: 无法攻击！城镇已经受到了攻击

English: Can't attack! Village owner is online.
中文: 无法攻击！当前城镇处于在线。

English: Can't attack your own clan members!
中文: 无法攻击自己联邦的成员！

English: Can't attack! Village has active shield
中文: 无法攻击！该城镇在保护期

English: Can't attack! Level difference is more than <level>
中文: 无法攻击！等级之间超过了<级>

English: Can't attack this village because its Town Hall is below level <number>.
中文: 不能攻击这个城镇，因为它的城镇大厅等级低于<数字>。

English: You need to train some troops first.
中文: 您需要先培养一些部队。

English: Unable to connect with the server. Check your internet connection and try again.
中文: 无法与服务器连接。请检查您的网络连接，然后再试一次。

English: You have lost connection with the server. Check your internet connection and try again.
中文: 你已经失去了与服务器的连接。请检查您的网络连接，然后再试一次。

English: Click the button below to reload the game.
中文: 点击下面的按钮来重新载入游戏。

English: Good news! A new version of the game is available.
中文: 好消息！一个新版本的游戏。

English: Client and server are out of sync!
中文: 客户端和服务器不同步！

English: Sorry, the servers are under maintenance. Please try again later.
中文: 对不起，服务器正在维护。请稍后再试一次。

English: You are now a member of clan <name>!
You have successfully founded a new clan!
中文: 您已经成功地建立了一个新的联邦！

English: Do you really want to leave?
Can't invite, player does not have a Clan Castle!
中文: 不能邀请，该玩家还没有一个联邦的城堡！

English: Player has already joined a clan!
中文: 该玩家已经加入了一个联邦！

English: You have already invited that player!
I'd like to join your clan

中文: 接收电平<LEVEL> <troop>从<avatar>！你收到援兵

English: You need to wait before requesting more reinforcements.
中文: 你需要等待前要求更多增援。

English: Your troops are stationed in Army Camps. Build more camps and upgrade them to muster a powerful army. If an Army Camp is destroyed, all troops inside will perish!
中文: 你的部队驻扎在军营。建立营地和升级他们组建一支强大的军队。如果一个军营被摧毁，里面的所有部队将灭亡！

English:
This is the heart of your village. Upgrading your Town Hall unlocks new defenses, buildings, traps and much more.
Destroying an opponent's Town Hall wins you the battle and you get one Star. Destroying 50% of enemy buildings gains you a second Star, while 100% annihilation awards full three Stars.
Beware, your enemies will be trying to destroy your Town Hall too!
For maximum protection, keep your Town Hall in the middle of your village and protect it with walls, traps and defensive buildings. Your enemies are sneaky and can attack from any side!
中文: 这是你的城镇的心脏。升级您的市政厅解锁新的防御，建筑物，陷阱等等。\ n 破坏对手的市政厅胜的战斗，你会得到一颗星。破坏敌人的建筑物的50％，获得第二颗星，而100％破坏获得第三颗星，\ n 注意，你的敌人会试图摧毁你的城镇大厅！\ n为了最大程度的保护，让您的城镇大厅在中中央，并由城墙，陷阱和防御性建筑来保护。你的敌人是偷偷摸摸的，可以来自任何方面的攻击！

English: Elixir is pumped from Ley Lines coursing underneath your village. Upgrade your Elixir Collectors to maximize elixir production.
中文: 农场生产粮食，升级农场，可提高其产量和粮食的存储容量。

English: These storages contain the elixir pumped from underground. Upgrade them to increase the maximum amount of elixir you can store.
中文: 谷仓可以用来存储粮食，升级谷仓可以提高最大存储量。

English: The Gold Mine produces gold. Upgrade it to boost its production and gold storage capacity.
中文: 金矿生产黄金。升级金矿，可提高其生产量和金币的存储容量。

English: All your precious gold is stored here. Don't let sneaky goblins anywhere near! Upgrade the storage to increase its capacity and durability against attack.
中文: 所有的金币都存放在这里，不要让偷偷摸摸的小偷到附近的任何地方！升级提高存储并增加其抗攻击能力和耐久性。

English: The Barracks allow you to train troops to attack your enemies. Upgrade the Barracks to unlock advanced units that can win epic battles.
中文: 军营允许训练士兵攻击你的敌人。升级兵营解锁更强大的兵种，可以赢得史诗般的战斗。

English: Cannons are great for point defense. Upgrade cannons to increase their firepower, but beware that your defensive turrets cannot shoot while being upgraded!
中文: 大炮是伟大的点防御。升级大炮，以增加他们的火力，但要注意，你的防御炮塔升级时无法攻击！

English: Archer Towers have longer range than cannons, and unlike cannons they can attack flying enemies.
中文: 火枪塔比大炮的射程更远的，而且他们还可以攻击飞行的敌人。

English: The Ultimate Arcane Defense! Tower Wizards cast powerful area effect spells that target both flying and ground troops.
中文: 终极的魔法防御！法师塔施放强大__的区域效果法术，可以攻击飞行单位和地面单位。

English: Lay a deadly trap with the Hidden Tesla! Our Wizards have trapped a storm cloud into each of these sneaky towers. When an enemy walks or flies close enough, the tower springs up and fries it using the power of Electrickery!
中文: 奠定了致命的陷阱，隐藏的电塔！奇才队已经陷入一场风暴云到这些偷偷摸摸的塔。当敌人走或飞足够接近时，塔簧和薯条使用的力量Electrickery！

English: This anti-air tower is deadly against flying enemies, but can't target foes on the ground. Place it wisely to cover as much airspace as possible.
中文: 这对飞行的敌人防空塔是致命的，但不能在地面上的目标敌人。明智地将其放置在尽可能覆盖尽可能多的空域。

English: The Mortar can mow down hordes of enemies by the splash damage from its shell. Don't let enemies get too close to it!
中文: 砂浆可以割下来成群的敌人的攻击时所造成的溅射伤害将它的外壳。不要让敌人太靠近它！

English: The Clan Castle flies the colors of your Clan. It also houses any reinforcement troops sent by your clanmates.
中文: 你的家族，家族城堡飞的颜色。它也安置任何增援部队你的族人们的伤害发送。

English: Nothing gets done around here without Builders! You can hire more builders to start multiple construction projects, or speed up their work by using green gems.
中文: 在这里什么都做不建筑工地！你可以雇佣更多的制造商启动多个建设项目，或用绿宝石，加快他们的工作。

English: What dark secrets do the Alchemists hide inside their Laboratory? Nobody has dared to look. All we know is that their research makes our spells and troops harder, better, faster and stronger!
中文: 方士什么黑暗的秘密隐藏在他们的实验室吗？没有人敢看。我们所知道的是，他们的研究使我们的法术和部队更加努力，更好，更快，更强！
实验室所需的水平<数字>

English: Chief, our shield is about to run out!
中文: 行政，是我们的盾牌是快要用完了！

English: Do you really want to stop constructing <item>? Only <number>% of the cost will be refunded.
中文: 你真的想停止建设的<item>吗？只有<编号>％的费用将被退还。

English: Do you really want to stop upgrading <item>? Only <number>% of the cost will be refunded.
中文: 你真的想停止升级的<item>？只有<编号>％的费用将被退还。

English: Do you really want to stop removing <item>?
Unlock Clans by rebuilding the Clan Castle!
中文: 解锁中队重建的家族城堡！

English: You've already built the maximum amount of these buildings.
中文: 你已经建立了这些建筑的最高金额。

English: You found a gem from the <name>!
You don't have enough room in Army Camps!
中文: 在军营，你没有足够的空间！

English: Upgrade or build Army Camps to house more troops, or send them to fight!
中文: 升级或建造军营，以容纳更多的部队，或给他们打！

English: Unit is already at maximum level!
Are you sure you want to buy <count> <resource>?
中文: 你确定你想要买<计数> <资源>吗？

English: Are you sure you want to buy <name>?

中文: 行政，我们的村庄被袭击了！

English: Chief, the village was attacked while you were gone!
中文: 主任，村遭到袭击，而你已经走了！

English: Welcome Chief! We sure have been waiting for you.
中文: 欢迎行政！我们肯定一直在等你。

English: This is your new village, isn't it lovely! Life here would be perfect if it wasn't for....
中文: 这是你的新农村，是不是很可爱！这里的生活是完美的，如果它不是为......

English: Oh no, it's the Goblin Horde! Quick, let's set up a Cannon to defend the village!
中文: 哦，不，这是地精部落！快速，让我们建立一门大炮来保卫村庄！

English: Place the Cannon in the center of the village. We must protect the Town Hall!
中文: 在中心摆放大炮。我们必须保护市政厅（Town Hall）！

English: Now's not the time to be stingy. Spend some green gems to speed things up!
中文: 现在不是吝啬的时间。花一些绿色的宝石，以加快速度！

English: Gwar, there they are! Goblin Horde ATTAAACK!!
中文: GWAR，他们在那里！地精部落，攻击！

English: Gwahaah, what is this? Another puny human!
中文: Gwahaah，这是什么？另一个弱小的人！

English: Phew, that was a close call. Thanks Chief!
中文: 唷，这是一个千钧一发。由于行政！

English: We built the village on a Ley Line. That means the Cannon will magically repair itself over time.
中文: 我们建村在莱伊线。这意味着炮会奇迹般地自我修复，随着时间的推移。

English: Gwarh, GOLD! We goblins love gold!
Wow, nice going! Now we need to get this village into fighting shape.
中文: 哇，很高兴！现在，我们需要得到这个村进入战斗状态。

English: Hiring a second builder will let you start two constructions simultaneously.
中文: 雇用第二生成器，可以让你同时启动两个结构。

English: Elixir is essential for training troops and building many structures.
中文: 药剂训练军队，建设许多结构是必不可少的。

English: You can pump Elixir from the underground Ley Line. Let's try it!
中文: 您可以从地下莱伊线泵药剂。让我们试试吧！

English: The collector can only store a small amount of Elixir.
中文: 器只能存储少量的药剂。

English: Let's build a Storage vat so we can stockpile the stuff!
中文: 让建立一个存储增值税，所以我们可以储存的东西！

English: We also need a safe place to store our gold reserves.
中文: 我们还需要一个安全的地方来存储我们的黄金储备。

English: Build a Gold Storage so we can stockpile gold!
中文: 建立一个黄金的存储，这样我们就可以储存金！

English: Chief, we need an army to fight those goblins! Let's build a Barracks.
中文: 行政，我们需要一支军队来对付那些小妖精！让我们建立一个兵营。
现在，让我们一些部队的训练！

English: Tap the Barracks and choose Train Troops
中文: 点击兵营，然后选择“训练士兵

English: That was a great battle! How shall you be known in our history?
中文: 这是一个伟大的战斗！你们如何知道我们的历史？

English: With the gold we took from the goblins, we can afford to upgrade the Town Hall.
中文: 我们从地精的金，我们有能力以提升市政厅（Town Hall）。

English: Good job! We can now build new buildings thanks to the Town Hall upgrade.
中文: 干得好！现在，我们可以建立新建筑由于大会堂升级。

English: If you're looking for new challenges to beat, just ask me by tapping here.
中文: 如果你正在寻找新的挑战，击败，只是问我通过点击这里。

English: Chief, you obviously know what you're doing. The whole village is counting on you!
中文: 主任，你明明知道你在做什么。整个村子指望你了。

English: Gwaaarh! I'm not through with you yet.
You may have beaten me once, but this goblin camp is a lot tougher.
中文: 您可能击败我一次，但，这哥布林营地是很多更严厉的。

English: You also need a place to store all your precious gold!
中文: 您还需要一个地方来存储你所有的金子！

English: That elixir needs a place to store it as well.
中文: 这灵药需要将它存储为一个地方。

English: Complete the tutorial to unlock this feature!
中文: 完成本教程解开这个功能！

English: The Wizards from Ivory Tower are here to help us! Let's take out the goblin camp!
中文: 从象牙之塔的奇才队是来帮助我们的！让我们的哥布林营地！

English: Well done. Now let's kick some green butt!
中文: 干得好。现在让我们来揭开一些绿色的屁股！

English: Attacking will disable your shield, and other players will be able to attack you. Are you sure?
中文: 攻击将禁用你的盾牌，和其他玩家将可以对你进行攻击。你确定吗？

English: Upgrade Town Hall to level 2 to unlock this feature!
中文: 市政厅升级到2级，解开这个功能！

English: Do you want to get more?
HINT: Tap and hold down unit icon to train multiple troops.
中文: 提示：点击并按住训练多个部队的单位图标。

English: Do you want to link your current game to this Facebook account?
中文: 你要链接到你目前的游戏本的Facebook帐户？

English: Do you want to save your current game on this Game Center account?
中文: 你要保存你目前的游戏，这个游戏中心帐户？

English: You're out of gems. Go to the Shop to get some more!
中文: 你的宝石。去商店得到一些更多！

English: Game is closing for a short maintenance break in 5 minutes. Attacking is disabled during the break.
中文: 游戏在5分钟内关闭很短的保养休息。在休息的攻击被禁用。

English: Attacking is disabled until the maintenance break is over.
中文: 攻击被禁用，直到维护休息。

English: Do you want to load Chief <name>'s village with Town Hall level <number>? Warning: progress in the current game will be lost.
中文: 你要加载首席<NAME>的村大会堂水平<数字>？警告：在目前的游戏进度将丢失。

English: This Facebook account is already linked to another Clash of Clans game. Link it to your current game instead?
中文: 这个Facebook帐户已链接到另一个冲突的家族游戏。将其链接到你目前的游戏呢？

English: View the strongest Clans & Players around the world
中文: 最强的战队与世界各地的玩家

English: NOTE! You can only change your name once!
中文: 注意！你只能改变一次你的名字！

English: Please rate or review Clash of Clans on App Store to give us valuable feedback!
中文: 请发表评论或评分部落冲突App Store上给我们提出宝贵的反馈！

English: Hey come back, your warriors need a leader
中文: 嘿回来，你的勇士需要一个领导者

English: Hey come back, your warriors need a leader
中文: 嘿回来，你的勇士需要一个领导者

English: Hey come back, your warriors need a leader
中文: 嘿回来，你的勇士需要一个领导者

English: Invalid name! Please try another one.
中文: 无效的名称！请尝试另一种。

English: Game Center friends appear when you're logged into Game Center
中文: 当你登录到游戏中心游戏中心的朋友
成为一个家族的一部分

English: Rebuild your Clan Castle to find allies and join the struggle for power!
中文: 重建你的的家族城堡找到盟友和参与的权力斗争！

English: Nothing says 'STAY OUT' quite like a good old-fashioned hidden bomb.
中文: 没有说“留出”相当像一个老式的隐藏炸弹。

English: This bouncy little number will toss unwanted visitors right off your property!
中文: 这个有弹性的小数目会折腾不受欢迎的访客，马上你的财产！

English: Walls are great for keeping your village safe and your enemies in the line of fire.
中文: 墙壁是伟大的火线保持你的村庄的安全和你的敌人。

English:
Credits

<names>

Clash of Clans _?<version>

All use of this software is subject to Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy at www.supercell.net.
For support contact clashofclans.feedback@supercell.net.
中文: 积分\ n \ n <names> \“n \ nClash的家族_？<VERSION> \ n版权所有2012超级单体有限公司保留所有权利。\ n所有使用该软件的条款和条件以及隐私政策的www.supercell.net\ n对于支持接触clashofclans.feedback的@ supercell.net。

English: If you want to play Clash of Clans with multiple iOS devices, connect using the same Game Center account
中文: 如果你要玩的冲突与多个iOS设备的家族，连接使用相同的游戏中心帐户

English: This shield will prevent all attacks on your village for a limited time. If you buy more than one shield, their durations are added up. Attacking other players will remove your shield.
中文: 屏蔽将阻止所有攻击你的村庄，在有限的时间。如果你买了一个以上的屏蔽，其持续时间相加。攻击其他玩家，将删除你的盾牌。

English: Tap multiple times in an empty area to deploy your troops
中文: 点击多次的空白区域部署部队

English: You can deploy multiple troops by holding down your finger
中文: 按住你的手指，可以部署多个部队

English: Tap or press and hold to deploy troops
Win <number> stars on the Campaign Map
中文: 运<数字>明星的战役地图
在多人对战中赢得<数字>奖杯
删除<数字>的障碍（树木，岩石，灌木）
<数字>的部队捐给你的族人们的伤害
在多人战斗中摧毁<数字>墙

English: Destroy <number> Town Halls in Multiplayer battles
中文: 在多人战斗中摧毁<数字>大会堂
成就完成！您收到<数字>的宝石。

English: Once you've rebuilt the Clan Castle, you'll receive clan invitations here
中文: 一旦你已经重建了家族城堡，您会收到家族邀请

English: Are you sure you want to change the language settings?
中文: 你确定要更改语言设置？

English: The Top 3 Clans receive: (divided equally among the top 10 players of the clan)
中文: 前3名的战队将获得：（平分跻身前10名选手的战队）

English: Upgrade a Gold Storage to level <number>
中文: 升级黄金的存储级<数字>

English: Destroy <number> Builder's Huts in Multiplayer battles
中文: 在多人战斗中摧毁<数字> Builder的小屋

English: When you're looking for a Big Boom, you need the Giant Bomb.
中文: 当你正在寻找一个大繁荣，你需要的巨型炸弹。
你的村庄进行了突击检查的<attacker>！

English: Chief, are you sure you want to give the order to retreat? Our army will be defeated!
中文: 总，你确定你想给的顺序，以退为进？我们的军队将被击败！

English: Chief, are you sure you want to end the fight now?
中文: 主任，你确定你现在想结束战斗吗？

English: What is the Shield and how does it work?
中文: 什么是盾和它是如何工作的？

English: The Shield prevents other people from attacking you for a period of time. You lose the shield when the time runs out, or when you attack another player. When your village is destroyed by an enemy attack, you automatically get a new shield for 12 hours. You can also purchase longer lasting shields from the shop.
中文: 一段时间内攻击你的盾牌阻止其他人。你失去了屏蔽时间耗尽时，或者当你攻击其他玩家。当你的村庄被摧毁敌人攻击时，你会自动获得一个新的12小时之盾。您还可以购买从商店更持久的盾牌。

English: What happens when the shield runs out?
中文: 盾运行时，会发生什么情况？

English: If you do not have an active shield and you exit the game, your village will be vulnerable to attacks from other players. The attacking player will be able to steal some of your resources, but never all of them. You can protect your village with defensive buildings, walls and traps, or by buying a new shield from the shop. Terrain obstacles and the edge of the map do not stop attacking units!
中文: 如果没有有效的屏蔽和退出游戏，你的村庄会受到来自其他玩家的攻击。攻击玩家将能够窃取你的一些资源，但从来没有所有的人。您可以保护你的村庄的防御性建筑，墙壁和陷阱，或从商店购买一台新的屏蔽。地形障碍和边缘的地图没有停止攻击的单位！

English: How do I join or create a clan?
中文: 我如何加入或创建一个战队吗？

English: In order to join a clan, you must first rebuild the Clan Castle. Once it's rebuilt, you can tap it and choose to join or create a clan. The Clan Castle can also house reinforcement troops from your clan mates. Troops garrisoned inside the Clan Castle will defend your village and can also be used to attack other players.
中文: 为了加入一个战队，你必须首先重建氏族的城堡。一旦重建，你可以点击它，并选择加入或创建一个战队。家族城堡也可以容纳的增援部队从你的战队队友。家族城堡内的驻防部队将捍卫你的村庄，也可用于攻击其他玩家。

English: How do I get more people into my clan?
中文: 我要如何让更多的人到我的家族？

English: You can invite your Game Center and Facebook friends to your clan or invite people from global chat.\n\nIn order to invite your Facebook or Game Center friends, your friend must first play Clash of Clans, connect to Game Center or Facebook with their account and have rebuilt their Clan Castle. After this, you can see your friend in the Friends menu, where you can tap their name and choose Invite from the context menu. Inviting from global chat works in a similar way: tap a player's message, and choose Invite from the context menu.
中文: 您可以邀请您的游戏中心和Facebook上的朋友，你的家族或邀请全球聊天的人\ n \ n为了邀请你的Facebook或游戏中心的朋友，您的朋友第一次玩的宗族冲突，连接到他们的游戏中心或Facebook。帐户，并重建他们的家族城堡。在此之后，你可以看到你的朋友的朋友“菜单中，您可以点击他们的名字，然后从上下文菜单中选择”邀请“。邀请以类似的方式从的全球聊天作品在挖掘球员的消息，并从上下文菜单中选择“邀请”。

English: Can I reset the game and start again from the beginning?
中文: 我可以重置游戏，从一开始就再次开始？

English: At the moment it's not possible to restart your game. However, you can start a new game on any device that doesn't have a previous game of Clash of Clans on it.
中文: 目前这是不可能的，重新启动你的游戏。但是，在任何设备上冲突的家族就可以了，没有以前的游戏，你就可以开始一个新的游戏。

English: How can I control my units in battle?
中文: 我怎样才能控制我的单位在战场上吗？

English: Once placed on the battlefield, your troops are autonomous and cannot be controlled once they are deployed. At the moment of deployment, each unit's first target is highlighted with crosshairs. Different units will attack according to their abilities and their preferred targets. Check each unit's info in the Barracks' Train Troops screen, and check different defensive turrets' info as well to learn which units they target.
中文: 一旦放置在战场上，你的部队是自治的，无法控制，一旦部署。目前的部署，各单位的第一个目标是突出了十字线。不同的单位，将根据自己的能力和他们的首选目标攻击。在兵营训练士兵的屏幕，检查各单位的信息，并检查不同的防守炮塔的信息，以及学习哪个单位的，他们的目标。

English: What happened to the troops that survived the battles?
中文: 的战斗中幸存下来的部队发生了什么事？

English: After combat, all troops deployed on the battlefield turn back into Elixir and soak into the earth.\n\nExpending troops to win battles is at the heart of strategy in Clash of Clans. Think of your troops as resources to be spent wisely. You should plan every battle carefully and try to use the right number of the right type of troops. Throwing all your troops to combat without considering the cost versus benefit can lead to a Pyrrhic victory, where you end up spending more resources than you gained.
中文: 战斗后，所有的部队在战场上转回到药剂浸泡到地球。\ n \ nExpending打胜仗的部队是在冲突的家族的核心策略。把你的部队的资源花在刀刃上。你应该计划每场战斗，并尝试使用正确数量的正确类型的部队。引发你的军队，以打击不考虑成本与效益的情况下，可以导致一个得不偿失的胜利，在那里你花了比你获得更多的资源。

English: I am unable to buy gems, there is no option in the game?
中文: 我不能买宝石，有没有在游戏中的选项吗？

English: Make sure that your device is set to allow in-app purchases. Go to Settings - General - Restrictions and check that In-App Purchases is set to ON. Then quit and restart the game: push the Home *(square) button on your device twice; tap and hold the Clash of Clans icon until it starts wobbling; tap on the upper-right red icon, push Home again, relaunch Clash of Clans and you should be able to buy gems.
中文: 请确保您的设备设置为允许在应用程序内购买。进入设置 - 通用 - 限制和检查，in-app购买被设置为“ON”。然后退出并重新启动游戏：推首页*（方形）在您的设备上的按钮两次，挖掘和持有的家族图标的冲突，直到它开始摇晃，轻点右上角的红色图标，再次推首页，重新启动的宗族冲突你应该可以买宝石。

English: I have just purchased gems but they never came through. What can I do?
中文: 我刚刚购买了宝石，但他们从来没有通过。我能做些什么呢？

English: While most of the transactions go smoothly, sometimes an answer from Apple or our servers might be slower than usual or might result in errors. Please wait some time and see if they will arrive. If this doesn't help, quit and restart the game. Your gems should be credited to you.\n\nIf this doesn't help, please contact our customer support at clashofclans.feedback@supercell.net and our support will help you as soon as possible.
中文: 虽然大部分交易顺利进行，有时从苹果的答案或我们的服务器可能比平常慢或可能会导致错误。请等待一段时间，看看他们是否会到达。如果这没有帮助，退出并重新启动游戏。你的宝石，应退还给您。\ n \ n如果这没有帮助，请联系我们的客户支持在clashofclans.feedback @ supercell.net，我们的支持将帮助你尽快。

English: Why is my clan's score smaller than all members' combined scores?
中文: 为什么我的家族的得分比所有成员的综合分数吗？

English: Clan Score is calculated using a formula that uses weighted scores from all clan members. It is not the sum of all members' scores. The Clan Score is designed allow a more competitive and fair clan ranking.
中文: 氏族分数计算公式，采用加权分数所有家族成员。这是不是所有成员的分数总和。的氏族分数的目的是让一个更具竞争力和公平的战队排名。

English: Is there a way to see a replay of an attack on my village?
中文: 有没有办法看到我的村庄重播攻击？

English: You can watch Replays from the Battle Log menu (the letter icon above attack button). It's a good idea to watch these as soon as possible as the system only stores a few of them and will remove the older ones if needed.
中文: 你可以看重播的战斗日志“菜单（字母图标按钮上面的攻击）。这是一个好主意，尽快观看这些系统只存储其中的几个，如果需要的话，将删除旧的。

English: Can I play multiple accounts on a single device?
中文: 我可以玩一台设备上的多个帐户吗？

English: Clash of Clans supports only one account per device.
中文: 冲突的家族支持每个设备只有一个帐户。

English: Can I connect multiple devices to the same account?
中文: 我可以将多个设备连接到同一个帐户？

English: You can play one game on multiple devices, but be sure to login to Game Center with the same account on each device. Logging into Game Center links your village to that Game Center account, and allows you to load your game on any device.
中文: 在多个设备上，你可以玩游戏，但要确保在每台设备上使用相同的帐户登录到游戏中心。登录到游戏中心联系村，游戏中心帐户，并允许你在任何设备上加载你的游戏。

English: Can I increase the text size?
中文: 我可以增加文字的大小？

English: To enjoy sharp text and beautiful graphics, we recommend playing Clash of Clans on an iPhone 4/4S, iPod Touch 4th generation or any iPad.\n\nThe game also works on older devices, but the gaming experience might not be optimal.
中文: 为了享受清晰锐利的文字和漂亮的图形，我们建议玩iPhone 4/4S，iPod Touch的第四代或任何iPad的冲突中队。\ n \ n此游戏也可以在旧设备上，但可能不是最佳的游戏体验。

English: Can I change my village's name?
中文: 我可以改变我的村庄的名字吗？

English: Sorry, you can't change the name of your village. Your villagers wouldn't know where they live!
中文: 对不起，你不能改变你的村庄的名字。你的村民们不知道他们身在何处！

English: I was disconnected and lost trophies. Can you return them to me?
中文: 我被断开，失去了奖杯。能不能把我吗？

English: If you lost trophies due to disconnection, you were either attacked or your own attack was cut short and you lost. Because of the scoring system used in Clash of Clans, we cannot return your trophies under any circumstances. This is because each trophy you lose is actually transferred to another player, and we cannot give you new trophies without unbalancing the ranking system.\n\nTo prevent loss of trophies due to network problems, we recommend that you attack other players only when you have a stable connection (preferably WiFi).
中文: 如果你失去了奖杯，由于断开，你被攻击或缩短自己的攻击，你失去了。由于冲突的家族中使用的评分系统，我们可以在任何情况下不返回你的奖杯。这是，因为每一个奖杯你失去了实际转让给其他玩家，我们不能给你新的奖杯，而不平衡的排名系统。\_\ n为了防止损失的奖杯，由于网络问题，我们建议，你攻击其他玩家，只有当你有一个稳定的连接（最好是无线网络）。

English: How does the trophy system work?
中文: 奖杯系统是如何工作的呢？

English: When fighting against other players, you will gain or lose trophies depending on the outcome of the battle. You can also lose or gain points when you're attacked, depending on if your defenders win the battle.\n\nThe exact number of points you can gain or lose is calculated based on how likely you are to win the match based both of your and your enemy's trophy points. Winning against the odds will give you more points than winning an easy opponent.
中文: 对其他玩家进行战斗时，你会得到或失去的奖杯根据战斗结果。您也可以失去或获得积分，当你攻击，如果你的后卫赢得这场战斗。\ n \ n此确切的点数，你可以得到或失去的计算基于两个怎么可能是你赢得了比赛你和你的敌人的战利品点。战胜的几率会给你更多的积分比赢得一个容易对付的对手。
“如何找到一个匹配的”工作吗？

English: Player vs. player matchmaking is based solely on the amount of trophies you have. Because of this it is possible to be attacked by a much higher or lower level player, if they have close to the same amount of trophies as you have.
中文: 量的奖杯你有完全基于玩家对玩家牵线搭桥。正因为如此，它是由一个更高的或更低的水平的球员能够被攻击，如果它们有接近奖杯你有相同量的。

English: What are Spells and how can I use them?
中文: 是什么法术，我怎么能使用呢？

English: In order to use spells, you must first upgrade your town hall to level 5. This unlocks a new building called Spell Factory. Spell Factory works quite similarly to Barracks. You can create the potions needed for spells in the factory, but there is a limit how many you can store at once. Upgrading the Spell Factory unlocks new spells and allows you to store more spells for combat.\n\nSpells can only be used when attacking other players. You can cast the spells similarly to how you deploy troops in the battle. Just select the spell from the bar at the bottom of the screen and tap where you want to cast it. Unlike troops, spells can be casted anywhere on the playfield.
中文: 为了使用魔法，你必须先升级您的市政厅到5级。解锁新的建筑，名为法术工厂的。法术工厂的运作非常类似军营。您可以创建药剂需要在工厂法术，但是是有限制多少，你可以存储一次。升级的法术厂解锁新的法术，使您可以存储更多的法术战斗。\ n \ nSpells下时，只能用于攻击其他玩家。您可以同样你如何部署部队在战斗中施放的法术。只需选择从酒吧在屏幕的底部，并点选您要投的法术。不同的部队，法术可以被转换的playfield上的任何地方。

English: How do I upgrade my buildings?

You can upgrade your buildings by tapping on them and choosing the \qUpgrade\q option. Upgrading your Town Hall unlocks new buildings and allows you to upgrade your existing buildings even further!\n\nBuildings will not work while they are being upgraded. This means that Mines and Elixir Pumps won't generate resources and Cannons and Towers won't shoot enemies while being upgraded.
中文: 通过点击，并选择\ qUpgrade \ q选项，你可以升级你的建筑。大会堂升级解锁新的建筑，并允许进一步升级您的现有建筑物\ n \ nBuildings将无法正常工作，而他们正在升级。这意味着，地雷和药剂泵不会产生资源和大炮和塔不会射击敌人，同时正在升级。

English: I was banned from the global chat. What can I do?
中文: 我被禁止从全球聊天。我能做些什么呢？

English: Please wait for the ban to expire. Do not contact the support because of this as support cannot affect the ban.
中文: 请稍候到期的禁令。请不要与支持，因为这的支持可以在不影响禁令。

English: Once upon a time in a clearing in a magical forest...
中文: 曾几何时，一个神奇的森林中的一块空地上......

English: Upgrade your cannons to improve your defense against intruders
中文: 升级你的大炮，以提高你的防御入侵者

English: Taking a break from Clash of Clans? Buy a Shield to protect your trophies!
中文: 休息冲突的家族吗？购买一个盾牌来保护你的奖杯！

English: Improve your army! Build the Laboratory and upgrade your troops
中文: 提高你的军队！建立实验室和升级你的部队

English: Out of gold? Try upgrading your gold mines
Upgrade your Army Camps to build a massive army!
中文: 升级你的军队训练营，建立一个庞大的军队！

English: Upgrade your walls to slow down the enemy
中文: 升级您的墙壁敌人减速

English: Defensive buildings like Cannons can't shoot while they are being upgraded
中文: 防御性建筑，如炮无法拍摄，而他们正在升级

English: Gold Mines and Elixir Collectors do not generate resources while they are being upgraded
中文: 金矿及药剂收藏家不会产生资源，而他们正在升级

English: Even if your village is completely destroyed, you always keep some of your Gold and Elixir
中文: 即使你的村庄被完全摧毁，你总是保持一定的黄金和药剂

English: Building good defenses is just as important as aggressive attacking
中文: 同样重要的是建立良好的防御是积极的攻击时

English: Barbarians tend to attack the nearest thing, regardless of building type
中文: 野蛮人倾向于攻击最近的事情，无论建筑类型

English: Archers attack anything in their range
中文: 弓箭手攻击任何在其范围内

English: Goblins are greedy for Gold and Elixir. Their favorite targets are resource buildings
中文: 地精是贪婪的黄金和药剂。他们最喜欢的目标是资源建筑

English: Goblins deal double damage to resource buildings
中文: 哥布林造成双倍伤害的资源建筑

English: Giants prefer to attack defensive structures like Cannons
中文: 巨人攻击防御结构像大炮

English: Giants can take a lot of damage. Deploy them first to draw the defenders' attention.
中文: 巨人可以造成很大的伤害。部署他们首先绘制的捍卫者的注意力。

English: Wall Breakers will try to destroy the nearest wall
中文: 华尔街断路器将试图摧毁最近的墙壁

English: Wall Breakers deal major damage to enemy walls, but blow up themselves in the process
中文: 墙断路器造成重大损害的敌人墙，但吹自己在这个过程中

English: Balloons primarily target enemy defenses like Cannons
中文: 气球主要是针对敌人的防御工事，如炮

English: The Balloon is a flying unit, which means that Cannons and Mortars can't target it
中文: “气球”是一个飞行单位，这意味着，大炮和迫击炮，不能将它作为目标

English: Wizards can dish out high damage, but can't take much in return
中文: 向导可以抛出高的伤害，但也花不了多少回报

English: Healers can heal your ground units, but won't attack enemies
中文: 治疗师可以治愈你的地面单位，但不会攻击敌人

English: The Healer is a flying unit. Air Defenses and Archer Towers can shoot her down quickly
中文: 小灵是一个飞行单位。空中防御和射手塔可以拍摄她迅速回落

English: The Dragon is a mighty flying unit that can attack both ground and air targets
中文: 龙是一个强大的，可以攻击地面和空中目标的飞行单位

English: Is P.E.K.K.A a knight? A samurai? A robot? No one knows!
中文: P.E.K.K.A好不好？武士？机器人？没有人知道！

English: The armor on P.E.K.K.A. is so heavy that the Spring Trap does not work on him.
中文: 的盔甲上P.E.K.K.A.的春节，陷阱不上他是如此沉重。

English: Cannons can only shoot at ground units
中文: 大炮只能拍在地面单位

English: Mortars can only shoot at ground targets
中文: 水泥砂浆只能拍摄地面目标

English: Mortars deal splash damage to all ground units near the hit location
中文: 水泥砂浆的处理碰撞位置附近的所有地面单位的攻击时所造成的溅射伤害将

English: Archer Towers can target both air and ground units
中文: 弓箭手塔可以针对空中和地面单位

English: Air Defense's rockets only work against flying units
中文: 防空火箭只能对飞行单位

English: The Wizard Tower deals damage against all units in the target area
中文: 精灵塔造成伤害，对各单位在目标区域

English: The Wizard Tower can target both ground and air units
中文: 精灵塔可以针对地面和空中单位

English: The Hidden Tesla tower is hidden from attackers until they come close enough
中文: 隐藏的特斯拉塔是隐藏的攻击者，直到他们足够接近

English: The Hidden Tesla can attack both air and ground units
中文: 隐藏的，特斯拉可以攻击空中和地面单位

English: Traps are hidden from the attackers until they get close enough
中文: 陷阱是隐藏的攻击者，直到他们得到足够接近

English: Clearing obstacles like rocks and trees sometimes rewards you with Gems
中文: 清除障碍，如岩石和树木，有时会奖励你与宝石

English: The Battle Log shows information about attacks against your village
中文: 战斗日志显示信息攻击你的村庄

English: You can watch Battle Replays from the Battle Log!
中文: 从战斗日志，您可以观看战斗回放！

English: Destroying an enemy's Town Hall always gives you one star
中文: 摧毁敌人的大会堂总会给你一个明星

English: Troops in the Clan Castle will defend your village
中文: 在家族城堡的军队将捍卫你的村庄

English: Troops in the Camps are for attacking only - they won't defend your village
中文: 在营地的军队只攻击 - 他们不会保护你的村庄

English: If you destroy an enemy's Army Camp, all troops inside will perish
中文: 如果你摧毁敌人的军营，里面的所有部队将灭亡

English: An active Shield protects you from all attacks
中文: 有效的屏蔽保护您所有攻击

English: You get a free Shield if an attacker destroys your village
中文: 如果攻击者破坏你的村庄，你得到一个免费的盾

English: You get a longer lasting shield if your village is destroyed completely
中文: 如果你的村庄完全被摧毁，你得到一个更持久的屏蔽

English: If you attack another player while you have an active Shield, you will lose the Shield
中文: 如果你攻击另一名球员，而你有一个活跃的盾，你就失去了盾

English: You can attack the Goblin Horde (play single player missions) without losing your active Shield
中文: 不失去你的有源屏蔽的情况下，你也可以攻击的地精部落（玩单人任务）

English: Need a bit more gold for an upgrade? Take it from the Goblins in a single player mission!
中文: 升级需要更多的黄金呢？地精在单人游戏任务！

English: All Trophies that you win are deducted from your opponents' trophies
中文: 你赢了所有的奖杯从对手的奖杯中扣除

English: Complete Achievements to earn free Green Gems!
中文: 完成成就获得免费的绿宝石！

English: Upgrade your Town Hall to unlock new buildings and new upgrade levels for your current buildings
中文: 您当前的建筑，升级您的大会堂，解锁新的建筑和新的升级

English: Rebuild the ruined Clan Castle to join forces with other players!
中文: 重建被破坏的家族城堡，与其他玩家联手！

English: Use the Clan Castle to request reinforcements from your Clanmates!
中文: 使用氏族的城堡，从您的氏族成员们要求增援！

English: Clan Castle reinforcement troops can defend your village from an enemy attack, or you can deploy them when attacking
中文: 家族城堡的增援部队可以从敌人的进攻，保卫你的村庄或进攻时，你可以将其部署

English: The Lightning Spell damages units and buildings in a small area.
中文: 闪电法术损害的单位和建筑物在小范围内。

English: The Healing Spell creates a ring of healing that heals your units while inside.
中文: 治疗法术创建的愈合，愈合你的单位，而里面的一环。

English: The Rage Spell creates a ring of rage that makes your units stronger and faster while inside.
中文: 愤怒法术的愤怒，更强，更快，你的单位，而内创建一个环。

English: The Jump Spell creates a ring which allows your units to jump over walls.
中文: 跳转法术创建了一个环，它可以让你的部队越过墙。

English: You can upgrade the Jump Spell to allow Giants and P.E.K.K.A.s to jump over walls.
中文: 您可以升级的跳转法术，让巨人和PEKKAs跳过墙。

English: Join the Clash of Clans Forums! Look in Settings - Help and Support.
中文: 加入冲突的家族论坛！在“设置” - “帮助和支持”。

English: You can upgrade your troops in the Laboratory to make them better and stronger!
中文: 你可以升级你的部队在实验室，使他们更好，更强！

English: The Damage statistic in unit and turret info is measured as Damage Per Second.
中文: 是衡量每秒伤害单位和炮塔资讯的损伤统计。

English: You can't cancel upgrades in the Laboratory once they are started. Plan ahead!
中文: 您可以不取消升级，一旦他们开始在实验室。提前计划！

English: Camps, Clan Castles and Storages remain functional while they are being upgraded.
中文: 营，家族城堡和存储功能，而他们正在升级。

English: Troops cannot be deployed on top of obstacles and decorations.
中文: 部队不能部署在顶部的障碍和装饰。

English: You can end battle and be victorious when you have won at least one star in it.
中文: 您可以结束战斗，当你赢得了胜利至少一星级。

English: If you see an offensive message in the chat, tap it and choose \qReport\q to report the player.
中文: 如果你看到一个进攻的消息，在聊天中，点击它并选择\ qReport \ Q报告玩家。

English: Use chat reporting only when necessary - don't get carried away!
中文: 报告只在必要时使用聊天 - 不要得意忘形！

English: Revenge attack is unavailable against players that you attacked first.
中文: 复仇攻击是对你攻击第一的玩家不可用。

English: The battle ends when you have expended all your troops, even if you still have Clan reinforcements or spells left.
中文: 战斗结束，当你在这方面花费你所有的军队，即使你仍然有宗族增援或法术离开。

English: Upgrading your Town Hall will grant you access to a new defensive weapon called X-Bow.
中文: 升级您的市政厅将给予你进入到一个新的防御性武器，被称为X-BOW。

English: You can set the X-Bow to attack both air and ground targets at a short range.
中文: 您可以设置在很短的范围内同时攻击空中和地面目标的X-BOW。

English: You can set the X-Bow to attack only ground targets at long range.
中文: 您可以设置X-弓在远距离攻击地面目标。

English: X-Bow uses Elixir as ammo. Remember to reload it after enemy attacks!
中文: X-弓使用的药剂作为弹药。请记住敌人的攻击后，重新加载它！

English: The Spell Factory is home to veteran Wizards who are better suited to creating magical weapons than front-line combat. Use their powerful Attack Spells to turn the tide of battle in your favor!
中文: 法术厂是家老谁更适合创造神奇的武器比前线作战的奇才队。利用其强大的攻击法术对你有利的战斗中力挽狂澜！

English: Upgrade the Spell Factory for more capacity
中文: 升级更大容量的法术工厂

English: Your Spell Factory is at full capacity!
中文: 你的法术厂是在满负荷！

English: Create powerful spells that can be used when attacking enemy villages
中文: 时，可用于创建功能强大的法术攻击敌人的村庄

English: Note! Removing troops from the queue will refund only <number>% of the cost.
中文: 注意！从队列中删除部队，仅将退还<编号>％的成本。

English: Note! Removing spells from the queue will refund only <number>% of the cost.
中文: 注意！从队列中删除法术，只将退还<编号>％的成本。

English: Please pick a name you like - you can't change it later!
中文: 请选择一个你喜欢的名字 - 你不能改变它！

English: Do you want to finish the upgrade of <item> for <number> Gems?
中文: 你想，到完成升级的<item>，<数字>宝石吗？

English: Do you want to finish the construction of <item> for <number> Gems?
中文: 你想为<数字>宝石完成建设<ITEM>的吗？

English: Player is already in a Clan.
Electrocute your enemies with bolts of lightning!\n\nCast this spell at the enemy village to damage buildings and units inside a small area.
中文: 闪电触电你的敌人！\ n__ \ nCast这个法术在敌人的村庄损坏的建筑物和里面的一个小面积的单位。

English: Heal your troops to keep them in the fight!\n\nCast this spell to create a Ring of Healing. Your units will be healed while they are inside this ring.
中文: 治愈你的部队，让他们在战斗！\ n \ nCast下这个法术创建一个治疗之环的。你的单位会被治愈，而他们在这个环。

English: Enrage your units to make them bigger, faster and stronger!\n\nCast this to create a Ring of Rage! Your units will gain speed and attack power while they are inside this ring.
中文: 激怒你的单位，使他们更大，更快，更强！\ n \ nCast下创建一个戒指愤怒！你的单位会获得速度和攻击力，而他们在这个环。

English: Canceling spells in the queue will return only <number>% of the cost.
中文: 取消法术的队列中，将只返回<数字>％的成本。

English: Sorry, we decided not to let you into the clan.
中文: 很抱歉，我们决定不让你进入氏族。

English: Sorry, we decided to kick you out of the clan.
中文: 很抱歉，我们决定踢你的战队。

English: You have been kicked from Clan: <msg>
Upgrade Town Hall to level <number> to build more!
中文: 升级大会堂级<数字>建立更多！

English: Upgrade Town Hall to level <number> to unlock!
中文: 升级大会堂级<数字>解锁！

English: was accepted to the clan by <name>
has been kicked out of the clan by <name>
Wait before sending another request to join this clan!
中文: 前等待发送另一个请求加入这个战队！

English: You don't have enough trophies to join this clan!
中文: 您没有足够的奖杯加入这个战队！

English: You are already in a clan!
You have already reported this player!
中文: 您已经报道了这个球员！

English: Your daily reporting limit has exceeded!
中文: 你的每日报告已超过限制！

English: Are you absolutely sure you that want to delete the current village and replace it with:
中文: 你绝对相信你，要删除当前村庄，取而代之的是：

English: Please type in \q<confirmword>\q and press the Okay button to complete the action
中文: 请输入\ Q <confirmword> \ Q，按好按钮完成操作

English: Your recent behavior in the global chat has been inappropriate.
中文: 在全球聊天最近的行为已经是不恰当的。

English: You are temporarily banned from global chat for:
中文: 您暂时禁止从全球聊天：

English: To report inappropriate behavior, tap on the offending message and choose \qReport\q.
中文: 报告不适当的行为上有问题的消息，请点击并选择\ qReport \ Q。

English: Welcome to the global chat. Please be respectful and polite towards others.\n\nOffensive behavior will result in a ban.
中文: 欢迎来到全球聊天。请尊重和礼貌对待他人。\ n \ nOffensive行为将导致的禁令。

English: You are banned from global chat!
Your behavior in global chat has been inappropriate and you are temporarily banned.
中文: 你的行为已经在全球聊天不适当的，你暂时禁止。

English: Attacking other players is temporarily disabled!
中文: 攻击其他玩家暂时禁用！

English: The X-Bow shoots mystical bolts with terrifying power. Load it with Elixir and the X-Bow works automagically. You can set it to target ground units at long ranges, or all targets at reduced range.
中文: X-弓射神秘的螺栓的可怕力量。加载它药剂的X-BOW自动的作品。您可以将其设置为目标的地面单位，在长期的范围内，或所有目标范围缩小。

English: Please type the first letters of the clan you want to search
中文: 请输入您要搜索的第一个字母的战队

English: Having trouble with walls? Try jumping over them!\n\nCast to give your troops temporary ability to jump over walls. Upgrade to also allow Giants and P.E.K.K.A.s to jump.
中文: 与墙壁有问题？尝试跳！\ n \ nCast下给你的部队暂时跳过墙的能力。升级到允许的巨人和PEKKAs到跳。
显示搜索结果\ Q <名称> \ Q

English: Boo! This creepy bomb is available for a limited time only.
中文: 嘘！这让人毛骨悚然的原子弹是只在有限的时间。
